Summary: Large Disc hovering over perrine bridge Twin Falls summer of 1995
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the summer of 1995 on a clear sunny day we were coming back from a day of shopping we were heading towards the free way when I saw a flying saucer from the back seat window of are car it was in the sky next to the Twin falls perrine bridge it took 3 loops around the blue lakes mall before taking off into the horizon it was truly memorable child hood experience i was 10 years old when this happened and i will never forget it
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Twin Falls
There were no other sightings in Twin Falls on or around August 5th 1995
This sighting has never been favorited.
